basic.description:
A foundation course aimed at developing basic skills in drawing and painting, embracing a variety of subjects, materials and techniques. 
NOTE    Materials: estimated cost: $250.
NOTE    Only available to students in the Faculty of Education
LEARNING HOURS    144 (72Lb;72P)
basic.subject: ARTF
basic.title: Fundamentals of Drawing and Painting

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from ARTF101;ARTF 105; ARTF 106; ARTF 127.
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from ARTF101;ARTF 105; ARTF 106; ARTF 128.
